Subskills.name: Inevitable Carnage
Subskills.description: Increases spinal tap's area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Hell's Reach
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum cast range of spinal tap.

Subskills.name: Blood and Gore
Subskills.description: Spinal tap executes enemies below a threshold of life causing them to explode with increased area of effect radius dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Vampiric Tendencies
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Bringer of Pain
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash an additional spinal tap.

Subskills.name: Increase in Suffering
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by spinal tap.

Subskills.name: Restoring Agony
Subskills.description: Chance to replenish a portion of your maximum mana on hit.

Subskills.name: Additive Curse
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum stacks of cartilage build up.

Subskills.name: Healing Torture
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of spinal tap healing you for a portion of your maximum life per hit.

Subskills.name: Demonic Grip
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Spinal Explosion
Subskills.description: Spines ripped from monsters have a chance to explode dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Violent Rip
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Internal Bleeding
Subskills.description: Spinal tap inflicts increased bleeding on hit. If the target is already bleeding, increase the tick frequency of existing bleed until it consumes the bleeding dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Eternal Suffering
Subskills.description: Conjure piercing bone spikes flying towards targets on hit dealing additional damage.
